root.str: Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Deploys an Anti-Air Phalanx turret that may be manned by allied players. VS only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "2" Gold Hood Ornament.
Happy Anniversary! Celebrate with this festive horn that releases a colorful burst of confetti.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Dervish's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Enlistment failed - your outfit must have at least #count([*member*]).
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.

Genudine Dynamics unveiled the Razor GD-23 in the early 29th century. The Razor quickly became popular due to its high accuracy and controllable recoil, allowing it to outperform other carbines at long distances. NC use only.
Advanced targeting system can lock-on to air and ground vehicles
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Now that we're clear, stay near the control point to recapture it for our Empire.
Some sissies may shy away from the Test Server, but not you! You hunted down bugs and crushed them like... Well, like bugs.
Earn a Copper Medal on 2 different CQC primary weapons.
Attaches a Focused Proton II 60mm Mortar to the Plasma Cannon. 60mm Mortar cannons fire explosive rounds with large blast areas that are most effective against infantry targets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 750 rounds.
Greetings, acolyte. We have assigned you #count([*cert_points*]). May Vanu's wisdom light your path.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> It is statistically likely that the heat signatures are the product of brush fires or a still-operational solar battery, but verification is required.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V14 Description(Delete Me -BB)
The Hepta scope utilizes a more versatile 7x magnification that makes it a solid choice for both long and medium ranges.
Charges the MAX suit with unstable energy. While active, increases damage output and movement speed, but increases damage received as well.
This armor can only be worn by NC Infiltrators.
Apply the Mongo Spots camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.

Praetor Umatherin of the Vanu Sovereignty has been searching for a talisman of symbolic significance. Although unusual, such a trinket has recently been seen in the possession of the Black Market implant vendor, FL-34.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. VS use only.
Apply the single use Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. NC use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
We've defused the bomb at the Eastern SCU!
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 3 months. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
Your First 5 Minutes - PlanetSide 2 Basic Training
Increases the range of the IFF Device
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 300 seconds.
Customize your Flash with this blue antenna ball. TR use only.
Defend allied bases, while fulfilling your air support objective
Allows for easy detection and tracking of hostile aircraft by placing indicators over them. When off screen, the indicators will clamp to the edge of the HUD to indicate which direction they are in.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140.
Only XP, resources, and cert point benefits apply to all characters.
Applies a camo to your character. NC use only.
Adds a bumper to your Sunderer. VS use only.
Increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 4 standard size magazines.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Mosquito by 12KPH.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 missiles.
Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the lock on range of the missile launcher by 64 meters.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 600 rounds.
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the Sunderer that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 10 seconds.
Apply the single use Arid Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases afterburner fuel replenishment rate by 40% and afterburner fuel capacity by 40%.
A new vehicle, new mechanics, and weapons!
Destroy any enemy vehicle as a MAX.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
This armor can only be worn by TR Combat Medics.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Flaming Skull Hood Ornament. TR use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Allows the Squad Leader to place green smoke as a rally point.
Allows the use of a gold plated Recon Detection Device, which reveals nearby enemies on the minimap.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 rockets.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> Do you have a license to drive an ANT on the surface? I'm in need of a large quantity of harvested Cortium. There's something I need to have synthesized and simply don't have the time to collect it myself. You'll be well-paid for your troubles.
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 490 rounds.
Damage from impacts striking the sides of the Lightning are reduced by an additional 15%.
Apply the Rock Lichen camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1500 rounds.
Allows use of the close range 2x MH2 sight.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Traveling beneath the seas of Oshur without vehicle support has proven challenging, but infantry are more difficult to detect than a typical land, air, or sea assault.

Allies within 6m of the pylon have their maximum shield health increased by 50.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.

The magazine-fed NS-R3 Swarm can switch between low velocity and high velocity rockets which lock onto both ground and air targets, allowing the user to tailor the weapon's tracking capabilities based on the engagement. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>
NC - Shared - Heavy Pistol - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
The heavy-hitting Eidolon VE33 features accurate semi-automatic fire capable of dropping distant targets with ease. VS use only.
Apply the Circuit Board pattern to your armor.
Increases the healing rate of the Aegis Barrier.
Attaches a 10x optical zoom to your weapon.
The automatic AF-18 Stalker is deadly in close quarters and medium range combat. NC use only.
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been rejected.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 missiles.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> This is definitely where the researcher landed. You should check out the area.
Improves the sensor darts scanning rate by a total of 0.5 seconds and extends the range to 35 meters; also extends each darts lifespan to 30 seconds.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 2.5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
[*target*]'s petition to join [*guild*] has been rejected.
Blades are for cosmetic purposes only. Do not attempt to disembowel your opponents with your helmet. VS use only.

Increases healing by 40% and revive speed 45%. Revives MAX units at 15% health.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Use the coordinates Dolan gave you to seek her out.
Unlock a grenade launcher attachment to alter your weapon with
Decreases the Charge reuse timer to 42 seconds
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "O" Hood Ornament.
When toggled on, you will not receive outfit invites.
Target beyond absolute maximum range of 800 meters.
DV-LAT Pixie magazine size certification line has been refunded and restructured.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> We have added one additional location to your map. This signature is much larger than the others, but weaker as well. Investigate this last area before returning.
Contains a NS-44 Commissioner plus 1000 Certs
Hunt down and kill bountied players.
The Diamondback assault rifle is a more aggressive take on the time-tested, and highly adaptable NS-11A.
Apply the Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Personalize your Sunderer with custom hubcaps. All factions can use this gear.
Instantly restores Magrider's energy to full, and breaks lockon attempts in the process. Can be used once every 28 seconds.
The Thumper heavy grenade launcher comes equipped with an anti-infantry fragmentation payload, and has access to multiple specialized munitions. All factions can use this weapon.
Rapidly locks on to and destroys ground-based vehicles

The SpacePumpkins have invaded, and can be found sown throughout the battlefield. Smash these pumpkins for Halloween-themed cosmetics and other rewards, and work toward a new Halloween Directive line complete with new rewards! In addition, we've added new empire Assault Rifles, a balance changes, quality of life improvements, and whole host of new Player Studio items.
<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Conversation is required at the Atrium in Sanctuary. Festivities. Please attend at your earliest convenience.
You are now the squad leader!
Contains Sigma Armor for all non-MAX infantry classes.
Improved vertical thrust, pitch, and agility.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1 missile.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Scythe by 18KPH.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Unlock the MGR-A1 Vanquisher with a full complement of attachments. For NC use only.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
The Magrider is the Vanu Sovereignty's main battle tank. It features the greatest agility of any battle tank and is the only tank that can strafe.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Reduces damage taken from flak by 10% and infantry small arms fire 20%.
The Flash is an ATV capable of getting the driver and one passenger quickly to the front lines. The passenger is able to use most of their personal equipment while riding on the back.
When equipped, the Front Guard reduces damage taken from front of the vehicle by 50%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 150 rounds.
Awarded for mastery of the Magrider, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is confirmation of the owner's tanking capabilities.
The New Conglomerate has taken Rashnu!
Adds 1 additional round to the magazine.
[*player*] has joined the squad with a squad boost.
When you interact with a terminal your view will switch to a menu of options available at the terminal.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 25 meters.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
While active, Hardline Interference Volume Emitters house cores which contribute to continent control in exchange for Cortium.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Head to the marked location on your map and use the encryption keys on the security console. You will need to access a terminal, so I'd recommend you go as an Infiltrator, just in case one of your pesky enemies controls the facility.
Terrify your enemies with this Ghoulish Horn. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the noise generated by footsteps for 2 hours. Rank 22 required.
Developed for close quarters combat and point defense, the T32 Bull's high rate of fire can tear through squads of enemy soldiers.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Control facilities and kill enemies to score points for your empire.
This continent has been conquered by the combined might of the

This scanner from Nanite Systems can be used to identify ideal locations to deploy relay devices. Includes several relays that amplify signals over short distances.

Use Fire to scan and use Aim to deploy.
Contains the NS Autoblade and a 1 Day Experience Boost.
Allows for the creation of a single galaxy dropship in the outfitwars game mode. Usable from the home base vehicle terminals by those who have outfit permission to use the item.
Unlock the NSX Naginata light machine gun with a full complement of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
Maggie's Test - Pew, pew, blah, blah
Apply the Shard camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Nanoweave Armor has been removed from your Infiltrator and its cert cost refunded.
Apply the single use Amerish Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Use Elysium Spawn Tubes and Routers to create spawn points for other players.
HEAT cannons, C4, and other explosive weaponry tends to deal more damage to player-made structures, while Armor Piercing weapons tend to deal more damage to player-made turrets.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Capture and hold these points to take control of the region. A successful uplink must be maintained in order to complete the transfer of control.
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 57 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Trouble certainly seems to find its way to Esamir, soldier. Head out to the nearest friendly Containment Site.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Apply the Roller Chain camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by .75 second, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%
Part of the Cycler family, the T8 Chieftain carbine was designed for more easily controllable, user-friendly fire.
When engaged, the afterburner burns fuel to increase the Liberator's top speed. An empty fuel tank regenerates in 22.22 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Large bulkhead doors sealed by magnetic locks. Defend the nearby console that controls the locks.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 shells.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Hello again, operative. It's time we took a closer look at the unearthed machinery at the heart of The Shattered Warpgate.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 missiles.
The NSX Tanto is a powerful, lightweight carbine which combines precision with versatility, and is most effective in short bursts. All factions can use NS weapons.
Can only be activated if the driver is an Infiltrator. Activate to cloak the Flash. Cloaking the Flash makes it and the riders nearly invisible, but disables firing. Lasts up to 30 seconds.
Apply the Cells camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Control territory and slay enemies to lock Esamir
Allows the Infiltrator to use Claymore proximity mines.
Boosts can increase the amount of experience and certs you earn or nanites you gain, and some give that bonus to your entire squad!
Named for the pandemonium this highly modified plasma-core shotgun can cause in a surprise ambush, the Chaos' reputation as a very deadly flanking weapon has been well earned.
Adds red chassis lights to the under carriage of the Prowler. TR use only.
This exclusive decal is granted to the world champions for Season 1 of PS2 Community Clash.
Based on a modified Fracture design, the Gatekeeper retains the feel of its forerunner but incorprorates a faster fire rate and projectile speed while increasing overall accuracy. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Original cartographic data is still available, but little history exists. Many soldiers were terminated during the evacuation of Oshur, prior to the construction of the rebirthing matrix.
Adds Hubcaps TR002 to your Flash. (DNT)
Facilities with Generators and Spawn Control Units (SCU) may also have a status indicator if those generators have been destroyed.
Use to enter the Phalanx Turret by the terminal.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Wings Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
This ornate blade hums with purpose, as if it has a hunger waiting to be satiated. The corrosive edge dissolves any metal it touches, but is somehow protected from devouring itself.
This low altitude hover buoy has been outfitted with a self-repair nanite projector that repairs all allied vehicles within 100 meters.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Magrider. VS use only.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 10 KPH.

Nanite Systems has deployed several high value agents to the field. Elimination of these agents will provide Black Market operatives with a significant competitive advantage. SPRK-33 on Sanctuary will be your point of contact. Compensation will be provided upon completion.
This 4th Anniversary Edition of the compact GR-22 has improved handling when firing on the move, making it an excellent choice for close quarters combat. NC use only.
Decreases the turret's cooldown between shots to 5.75 seconds.
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 11 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Get cool perks, support the game, and fund spandex for Infiltrators.
Make your presence known with this high-pitch horn from Nanite Systems. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Matte White camo pattern to your armor.
Fires rapid, accurate unguided plasma projectiles to destroy enemy vehicles
Increases the Idle Timer on the Flash to 7 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 rockets.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Brush camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Hold to activate your jetpack. This consumes energy while active and will recharge when not in use.
Sing the song of your people to your enemies before flattening them. All Factions can use this gear.
Increases resource gain by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "G" Hood Ornament.
Add a new credit card to your account.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second and prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map.
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Kills and revives restore 30% of your Nano-Regen Device energy. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>

The rail mounted Darklight Flashlight can illuminate hostile cloaked infiltrators and dark areas but the light can give away your position.

The light can be turned on and off with Toggle Attachment.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Galaxy's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 210 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Taking fall damage will cloak you for 1.75 seconds. Firing a weapon will reveal you.
The Skyguard Turret fires specialized flak ammunition into the sky which explodes in the vicinity of passing aircrafts
Gather and deposit Cortium into the Refinery
Apply the Amerish Brush camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Flaming Skull Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.

Heavy modification has reclassified this NS-30 Vandal as a "non-lethal rifle," capable of firing concussive smart-slugs that slow enemy infantry on impact. While less powerful than the original, the Tranquility boasts higher projectile velocities, and remains suppressed at all times.
Applies an MLG decal to your armor.
Vehicle cannot be deployed here because the vehicle is too close to another deployed vehicle of the same type.
This pink laser sight increases the weapon's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Join an outfit to work together as a larger team. Use the Outfit Finder in the Social Menu to apply for an outfit.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Have you ever just looked over the battlefield and marveled at its complexity? Its beauty? I have been told that you spend most of your time planetside. Help me find the perfect place to gaze over the battlefield and you will be compensated.
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Can you get me put back together?
Ammunition Package - Tool 1 - Add Range Description
The Hornet Missiles are laser guided and will fly towards the pilot's crosshairs. NC use only.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 50%.
Earn an Auraxium Medal on 5 different carbines.
Unlock the MGR-S1 Gladius with a full complement of attachments. For NC use only.
External Fuel Tanks maximum afterburner fuel capacity bonus increased to 80%.
This exclusive decal is granted to the North American champions for Season 1 of PS2 Community Clash.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Apply the single use Indar Savanna camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your armor.
Improved speed and acceleration. (More effective than previous rank)
An under barrel grenade launcher weapon attachment.
Reduces the lock on time of the missile launcher by 10%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 162 rounds.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Applies a camo to your character. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "Q" Hood Ornament.
Kill enemies or damage enemy vehicles while near an active convoy.
Speak to your Oshur faction representative
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Creates a protective bubble around the Defector that blocks incoming projectiles using the Defector's health pool. While active, Defector's armor is increased by 60% and movement speed is decreased by 40%. Lasts up to 8 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
Turning this on will enable in game voice chat between you and other players.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
[*player*]'s Alarm Module: Nearby constructs in the [*region*] region are under attack!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.09 seconds.
You automatically repair 5% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Be aware that you will need to manually activate the Scanner in order to update its gauge. And the closer you get to your target, the more that gauge will be filled.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> In order to accomplish your mission, we put together a new gadget known as a Signal Scanner. You should be getting these schematics shortly.
Setting an overall quality will change all of the options below to the same setting value.
Starboard superstructure component has been damaged
Apply the Indar Scrub camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Anyways, I just wanted to make sure you kept that hush-hush for now. Don't want word getting out about downloading folks into Nanite Systems' robots. Not that anyone would believe it.
This armor can only be worn by VS Infiltrators.
Apply the Petal camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Reduces the lock on time of the missile launcher by 5%.
This armor can only be worn by the NSO Combat Medic.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 shots.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rockets.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 20%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
AV Mine Detonates, dealing heavy damage
OR Earn Transport Kill Assists while piloting a Reclaimed vehicle
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 4 KPH.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Deployment Officer:</font> Command request received. Initiating asset deployment.
Unlocks the G-AMS, allowing the Galaxy to deploy into a respawn location.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 5%

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster: </font> What's more is that this signature is emitting frequencies normally reserved for off-world communications. Please approach the crater, operative. You will need to be on foot for this.
Outfits must have at least %0 members to join.

Unwilling or unable to leave the relative safety of Sanctuary, a Facilitator for the Nanite Systems Operatives reaches out to nearby soldiers to help pinpoint a location of aesthetic and tactical superiority.
Allows use of the close range 1x TekLyte sight.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 64 rounds.
Improves the efficiency of the Nanite emitters, increasing the maximum duration the shield can remain active to 15 seconds.
Inactive Cores: %0, %1 until first becomes neutral
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Seek and destroy pumpkins on Hossin
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2250 rounds.
Convoys periodically depart from the Warpgate to bring much needed supplies and support to the battlefront.

Toggle on to create Darius Shields around the rumble seats of the vehicle, protecting those passengers from direct fire. Damage done to shields drains power, shields will go down when toggled off or power reduced to zero. Power regenerates when shields are down and will regenerate to full within 25 seconds. Shields cannot be toggled back on until power reserve is greater than 25%
<font color="#00FFAA">SPRK-33:</font> *POP* *HISS* *CRACKLE* *SPARK* *SPARK*(This probably means that the Battery for the NS-1317X Surface-to-Orbit communicator is wrapped and under the tree.)
Must be BR100+ and have unlocked the Advanced Specialization Program.
The battlefields of Auraxis are harsh and unforgiving. Death is an inevitability.
This customization adds a Dark Green decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "L" Hood Ornament.

Standing still for 0.75 seconds provides you with 20% small arms resistance to bodyshots until you start moving again. <font color="#dc9c36">Does not stack with Nanoweave Armor. Inactive in vehicles.</font>

<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> SPRK-33. Black Market vendor. Constructing a Skylance in his spare time. Unable to acquire proprietary grav rotor. Scans show that Facilitator Campner may be amenable to an exchange.

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Problem with most rocks is getting to them in the first place, but Nanite Systems has some fancy drills that are churning crystalized minerals to the surface. They'll be sending down drills periodically on all continents.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rockets.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.
Single Use Indar Dry Ocean Vehicle Camo
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. TR only.
Resupply at an equipment terminal or respawn for changes to take effect
This customization adds a Broken Glass decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
A prime example of superior alien technology. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been directed to remind you to place the waypoint inside of the designated area so our analysts can get an accurate scan of the location.
Increases the user's sprint speed by 10% while equipped.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Marks on the walls have been noticed, but no serious damage. Enable the diagnostics system to find areas of severe damage that require manual reconstruction.
The capture status shows a bar which represents capture progress. Below the bar is a time estimate for when the capture will be completed for the capturing empire.
The Light PPA is a slow-firing plasma cannon that inflicts massive damage at close range. VS use only.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 2 seconds and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
Customize your Flash with this purple blinking antenna ball. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 rockets.
The Vanu Sovereignty has defended Peris!
Reduce the acquire timer of the Galaxy for 1 hour. Rank 12 required.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 14%.

The LA1 Anchor is tuned for close quarters effectiveness. It features high damage, moderate rate of fire, advanced laser attachments, and a 50 round box magazine for quick combat reloads. NC use only.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to vehicles.
Adds hubcaps to the Harasser. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Lookin' good, lookin' good. Virus administered. Get to the next target.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%
Advance your player-made bases to the next level and provide utility to your empire. Unlocks construction schematics for vehicle terminals, spawn points, ammo distribution, and more.
